data.name: Fairy Tail Mashup Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


Important Notice

The sale of this content will be discontinued after June 20th, 2017 (JST). You will still be able to continue to use the content you have already purchased.


About the Game

To all the wizards! Join the Dead or Alive guild! Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version. Content included: Fairy Tail Mashup - Kasumi & Erza Scarlet Fairy Tail Mashup - Ayane & Yukino Agria Fairy Tail Mashup - Kokoro & Mirajane Strauss Fairy Tail Mashup - Hitomi & Juvia Lockser Fairy Tail Mashup - Leifang & Ultear Milkovich Fairy Tail Mashup - Tina & Kana Alberona Fairy Tail Mashup - Helena & Aquarius Fairy Tail Mashup - Momiji & Kagura Mikazuchi Fairy Tail Mashup - Marie Rose & Wendy Marvel Fairy Tail Mashup - Nyotengu & Minerva Orland Fairy Tail Mashup - Honoka & Lucy Heartfilia Fairy Tail Mashup - Hayate & Jellal Fernandes Fairy Tail Mashup - Eliot & Natsu Dragneel Fairy Tail Mashup - Phase 4 & Erza Scarlet Fairy Tail Mashup - Gen Fu & Makarov Fairy Tail Mashup - Ein & Gray Fullbuster *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
data.about_the_game:
To all the wizards! Join the Dead or Alive guild!

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

Content included:
Fairy Tail Mashup - Kasumi & Erza Scarlet
Fairy Tail Mashup - Ayane & Yukino Agria
Fairy Tail Mashup - Kokoro & Mirajane Strauss
Fairy Tail Mashup - Hitomi & Juvia Lockser
Fairy Tail Mashup - Leifang & Ultear Milkovich
Fairy Tail Mashup - Tina & Kana Alberona
Fairy Tail Mashup - Helena & Aquarius
Fairy Tail Mashup - Momiji & Kagura Mikazuchi
Fairy Tail Mashup - Marie Rose & Wendy Marvel
Fairy Tail Mashup - Nyotengu & Minerva Orland
Fairy Tail Mashup - Honoka & Lucy Heartfilia
Fairy Tail Mashup - Hayate & Jellal Fernandes
Fairy Tail Mashup - Eliot & Natsu Dragneel
Fairy Tail Mashup - Phase 4 & Erza Scarlet
Fairy Tail Mashup - Gen Fu & Makarov
Fairy Tail Mashup - Ein & Gray Fullbuster

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
data.short_description:
This set contains all Fairy Tail Mashup costumes. This set contains one costume each for 16 characters.

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

©Hiro Mashima・KODANSHA/Fairy Tail project・TV TOKYO. All Rights Reserved. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
